summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Westbound by the Sound; Jordan's Acre Gardens; vacated 53rd Avenue South; Riverton Acre Tracts; southeast quarter of Section 17, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; northwest quarter of Section 8, Township 26 North; Range 4 East; Lake Forest Park Third Addition; Allendale; and, Haller Lake Tracts, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
